symbol-mapping-conversion.toggleStatusBa: Switch the symbol-mapping-conversion bottom status bar
symbol-mapping-conversion.createMappingF: Create a mapping from the current selection
symbol-mapping-conversion.showInsights: List bulk-detection insights and quick actions
symbol-mapping-conversion.manageBulkOver: Inspect or edit per-language bulk detection overrides
symbol-mapping-conversion.showSkipHistor: Display the most recent bulk skip events
symbol-mapping-conversion.pairMappings: Bracket pair definitions used when wrapping selections
symbol-mapping-conversion.bulkDetection: Fine-tune the heuristics that determine whether a change is treated as a bulk edit
Maximum number of simultaneous changes before treating it as bulk (set 0 to disable)
Maximum character length per change before treating it as bulk (0 to disable)
Maximum line span per change before treating it as bulk (0 to disable)
Total characters inserted within 1s before treating it as bulk (0 to disable)
Minimum number of lines in a single change to be considered a full document replace (0 to disable)
Milliseconds window for detecting high-frequency edits (0 to disable)
Number of edits within the interval that trigger bulk detection (0 to disable)
symbol-mapping-conversion.bulkDetectionO: Per-language overrides for bulk detection thresholds
symbol-mapping-conversion.autoPause: Automatically pause bulk detection after repeated skips
symbol-mapping-conversion.autoPause.trig: Number of consecutive skips before auto-pausing
symbol-mapping-conversion.autoPause.dura: How long (ms) to pause once triggered (0 = until manual resume)
symbol-mapping-conversion.autoActionOnSk: Run a VS Code snippet when bulk detection skips occur
The VS Code snippet template to insert (supports $1, $REASON etc.)
Limit snippet execution to specific language ids
symbol-mapping-conversion.notifications: Control skip notifications and tooltip details
Show VS Code notifications when skips occur
Include reason summaries in the status-bar tooltip
symbol-mapping-conversion.autoRemediatio: Automatically run a snippet after many skips and optionally pause detection
Number of skips required before running the remediation snippet
Snippet text to insert when remediation triggers
Pause bulk detection automatically after the snippet runs
Name of a VS Code snippet (language/global) to run instead of inline text
Limit auto-remediation to specific language ids
symbol-mapping-conversion.copyMap: Whether to also convert copied and pasted content
